name: trends
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_music_api_detailed.
Tool description: Detailed Youtube Music API. Lyrics, Trends, Albums, Artists, Songs, Users, Playlists, Songs etc.
API description: Fetches the latest charts data from YouTube Music for a specified country. The charts include top songs, top videos, top artists, and top trending videos. For the US, it has an additional Genres section with some genre-specific charts.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to specify the region for which to fetch the trending charts.
